name: Armored Blow
desc: Def+6 when initiating combat.

name: Avoid +10
desc: Avo +10.

name: Axe Crit +10
desc: Crit +10 when using an axe.

name: Axefaire
desc: Mt +5 when using an axe.

name: Bowfaire
desc: Mt +5 when using a bow.

name: Bowrange +1
desc: Increases range of bows by 1.

name: Bowrange +2
desc: Increases range of bows by 2.

name: Brawl Avo +20
desc: Avo +20 when brawling.

name: Canto
desc: After performing an action, user can use their leftover movement.

name: Charm
desc: When allies adjacent to the unit enter combat, they gain +3 dmg.

name: Locktouch
desc: Unit can open locks and chests without keys.

name: Steal
desc: Unit can steal non-weapon items from enemies with lower Spd.

name: Battalion Vantage
desc: If unit's HP ≤ ⅓, unit always attacks first.

name: Battalion Wrath
desc: If foe initiates combat while unit’s HP ≤ ⅓, grants Crit +50.

name: Battalion Desperation
desc: If unit initiates combat while HP ≤ ⅓, unit’s follow-up attack (if possible) occurs before foe’s counterattack.

name: Offensive Tactics
desc: Mt +5 and Hit+20 with gambits.

name: Axebreaker
desc: Hit/Avo +20 when using a sword against axe users.

name: Sword Crit +10
desc: Crit +10 when using a sword.

name: Honorable Spirit
desc: If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Mt +3 when in combat with an adjacent foe.

name: Critical +20
desc: Crit +20

name: Death Blow
desc: Str +6 when initiating combat.

name: Defiant Avo
desc: Avo +30 when HP ≤ 25%.

name: Duelist’s Blow
desc: Avo +20 when initiating combat.

name: Faith Magic Heal +5
desc: White magic heals HP +5.

name: Faith Magic Heal +10
desc: White magic heals HP +10.

name: Faith Magic Uses x2
desc: Doubles the number of uses of Faith spells.

name: Faith Tomefaire
desc: Mt +5 when faith magic is equipped.

name: Fiendish Blow
desc: Mag +6 when initiating combat.

name: Fire
desc: Enables the use of Fire. If already learned, doubles the amount of uses.

name: Fistfaire
desc: Mt +5 when using gauntlets.

name: Heal
desc: Unit can use heal. If already learned, doubles the number of uses.

name: Heartseeker
desc: ReducesA vo of adjacent foes by 20.

name: Lancefaire
desc: Mt +5 when using a lance.

name: Lethality
desc: (Dex/4)% chance to instantly kill foe when dealing damage.

name: Lifetaker
desc: Recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt after defeating a foe.

name: Miasma Δ
desc: Enables the use of Miasma Δ. If already learned, doubles the number of uses.

name: Seal Defense
desc: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Def -6 for 1 turn after combat.

name: Seal Resistance
desc: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Res -6 for 1 turn after combat.

name: Seal Speed
desc: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Spd -6 for 1 turn after combat.

name: Seal Strength
desc: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Str -6 for 1 turn after combat.

name: Swordfaire
desc: Mt +5 when using a sword.

name: Terrain Resistance
desc: Unit does not receive terrain damage.

name: Uncanny Blow
desc: Hit +30 when initiating combat.

name: Reason Tomefaire
desc: Mt +5 when Reason magic is equipped.

name: Reason Magic Uses x2
desc: Doubles the number of uses of Reason spells.

name: Renewal
desc: Unit recovers up to 20% of max HP at the start of each turn.

name: Unarmed Combat
desc: User can fight without a weapon equipped.

name: Vantage
desc: Always attack first when under 50% HP.

name: Weight -5
desc: The combined weight of equipment is reduced by 5.

name: Wrath
desc: If foe initiates combat while unit’s HP is ≤ 50%, Crit +50.

name: Lance Crit +10
desc: Crit +10 when using a Lance

name: Swordbreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using a lance against sword users.

name: Lancebreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using an axe against lance users.

name: Close Counter
desc: Allows unit to counterattack adjacent foes.

name: Fistbreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using a bow against gauntlet users.

name: Bow Crit +10
desc: Crit +10 when using a Bow.

name: Tomebreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using gauntlets against magic users.

name: Brawl Crit +10
desc: Crit +10 when using Gauntlets

name: Bowbreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using magic against bow users.

name: Reason Magic Range +1
desc: Range +1 when Reason magic is equipped.

name: Faith Magic Range +1
desc: Range +1 when Faith magic is equipped.

name: Weight -3
desc: Total weight of equipment is reduced by 3.

name: Armored Effect Null
desc: Nullifies extra effectiveness against armored units.

name: Dexterity +4
desc: Dex +4

name: Movement +1
desc: Mvt +1

name: Cavalry Effect Null
desc: Nullifies extra effectiveness against cavalry units.

name: Alert Stance
desc: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Avo +15 for 1 turn.

name: Alert Stance+
desc: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Avo +30 for 1 turn.

name: Flying Effect Null
desc: Nullifies extra effectiveness against cavalry units.

name: Commander
desc: Nullifies instant death effects, status effects, and movement effects, and reduces damage from enemy gambits to one-fourth.

name: Cursed Power
desc: Unit recovers HP on swamp terrain.

name: Dragon Effect Null
desc: Nullifies extra effectiveness against dragons.

name: Effect Null
desc: Nullifies all effectiveness.

name: General
desc: Nullifies instant death effects and halves damage from enemy gambits.

name: Giant Wings
desc: +30 Avo sword, lance, and axe-wielding foes when barrier is active.

name: Immune Status
desc: Nullifies status effects and debuffs.

name: Infantry Effect Null
desc: Nullifies extra effectiveness against infantry.

name: Keen Intuition
desc: +30 Avo when enemies are 2 or more spaces away.

name: Magic Bind
desc: If unit lands a hit, targeted foe is unable to use magic for 1 turn.

name: Monster Effect Null
desc: Nullifies extra effectiveness against monsters.

name: Poison
desc: Chance to inflict poison on foe when dealing damage. Trigger % = Dex stat.

name: Surging Light
desc: Performs staggering blows immediately.

name: Vital Defense
desc: Negates critical hits against the user when barrier is active.

name: Professor’s Guidance
desc: +20 XP gained to unit and adjacent allies.

name: Royal Lineage
desc: +20 XP gained.

name: Live to Serve
desc: When healing allies, unit is healed by the same amount.

name: Staunch Shield
desc: If unit waits, +4 Def for 1 turn.

name: Lone Wolf
desc: When no battalion deployed, Mt +5.

name: Perseverance
desc: Rally grants +4 Str.

name: Philanderer
desc: Dmg dealt +2, dmg received -2 when adjacent to female ally.

name: Lady Knight
desc: When using a Gambit, Mt +3, Hit Rate +5.

name: Martyr
desc: While HP < 50%, grants +20 Crit to adjacent allies.

name: Strife Seeker
desc: While this unti’s HP < 50%, unit gains +3 Mt and +10 Avo.

name: Guardian’s Vigil
desc: While HP > 50%, enemies cannot pass through adjacent tiles.

name: Adapt and Overcome
desc: After taking a physical attack, +3 Def. After a magical attack, +3 Res. Only one active at a time. Lasts one turn.

name: Natural Born Leader
desc: Gambit Mt +5.

name: Distaste
desc: Mt +3 against male enemies.

name: Imperial Lineage
desc: +20% XP gained.

name: Officer Duty
desc: Gambit Mt +5.

name: Songstress
desc: At the start of each turn, restores adjacent allies’ HP by 10%.

name: Confidence
desc: When HP is full, Hit/Avo +15.

name: Persecution Complex
desc: When HP is not full, Mt +5.

name: Hunter’s Boon
desc: When foe has less than 50% HP, Crit +20.

name: Born Fighter
desc: Avo -10 to adjacent foes.

name: Catnap
desc: If unit waits, restores 10% HP.

name: Cheerful Spirit
desc: Rally giants +3 Mag and +3 Str.

name: Motherly
desc: Raises Mt and Def of adjacent allies by 3 when their health is lower than 50%.

name: Never Reveal Your Secret
desc: Half of the overkill damage done to an enemy unit will heal this unit.

name: Disarm With Charm
desc: Hit -10 to adjacent foes.

name: Breath of Life
desc: After the unit initiates combat, heal all adjacent allies by 5 HP.

name: Dauntless
desc: While this unit has 2+ enemies and no allies within 2 spaces, +10 Avo and +3 Mt.

name: One Step Ahead
desc: Lck% chance of countering before the enemy attacks.

name: Leicester Lineage
desc: +20% XP gained.

name: Advocate
desc: +3 dmg dealt by adjacent male allies.

name: Distinguished House
desc: Dmg +2 when a battalion is deployed.

name: Goody Basket
desc: At start of turn, unit has Lck% chance of recovering 10% HP.

name: Mastermind
desc: Unit gains 2x skill XP from combat.

name: Watchful Eye
desc: Hit +20.

name: Animal Friend
desc: At start of turn,restores 20% HP when adjacent to horseback or flying ally.

name: Rivalry
desc: Dmg dealt +2, dmg received -2 when adjacent to male ally.

name: Exotic Dance
desc: If unit isn’t mounted, they may take the dance action to refresh allied units.

name: Three’s a Crowd
desc: If unit has exactly one ally adjacent to her at the start of the turn, the ally gains 10% of their HP, and unit takes -3 damage until their next turn.

name: Cat’s Claws
desc: When HP < 50%, Crit +15

name: Infirmary Master
desc: Adjacent allies gain Crit Avo +10 during combat.

name: Guardian
desc: +3 Mt to adjacent female allies during combat.

name: Lily’s Poise
desc: -3 Dmg to adjacent allies during combat.

name: Fighting Spirit
desc: -5 Dmg taken when no battalion is deployed.

name: Survival Instinct
desc: If unit initiates combat and defeats foe, grants Str/Mag/Dex/Spd +4 for one turn.

name: Compassion
desc: Rally grants ally Lck +8

name: Aptitude
desc: Boosts growth rates during Level Ups by 20%.

name: Murderous Intent
desc: Hit +20 when initiating combat.

name: Veteran Knight
desc: -2 Dmg taken if a battalion is deployed.

name: Shining Ninja
desc: If unit waits, Mt +2 to adjacent allies. If no adjacent allies, Mt +3 to self.

name: Nine Lives
desc: When HP > 50%, survive any OHKO with 1 HP.

name: Snacktime Preparation
desc: If unit waits, restores 10% HP.

name: Song of Rest
desc: At the start of each turn, restores adjacent allies’ HP by 10%.

name: Sturdy Stance
desc: If foe initiates attack, +2 Str/Def.

name: Circadian Beat
desc: Str/Mag +3 when indoors, Def/Res +3 when outdoors.

name: Monstrous Appeal
desc: Mt x3 vs monsters, monsters more likely to target unit.

name: King of Grappling
desc: Str/Def +6 when HP > 50%.

name: Devotion
desc: -3 Dmg to adjacent allies during combat.

name: Optimist
desc: When adjacent to more than one foe when initiating combat, Avo/Hit +10 and Mt +3.

name: Hypeman
desc: Crit +5 when a battalion is equipped.

name: Arcane Intuition
desc: Avo +10 when enemy initiates combat.
